about.headline: Hi, I'm Andre Almeida
about.role: Shopify Expert Developer & Ecommerce Growth Specialist
about.bio1: My journey in ecommerce started over 6 years ago when I developed my first Shopify store and realized the transformative potential of electronic commerce for entrepreneurs around the world.
about.bio2: Since then, I've delivered over 100 projects in 15+ countries, including Brazil (especially Greater SÃ£o Paulo), United States, Canada, United Kingdom, and Australia. Each project brought unique learnings and allowed me to constantly evolve.
about.bio3: What started as a passion for solving technical problems and helping businesses grow online naturally evolved into a specialized team. Today, I lead developers, designers, paid traffic specialists, CRO strategists, and AI experts â€” all united by one goal: transforming ecommerce visions into profitable, scalable businesses.
about.bio4: We combine cutting-edge technical expertise with proven marketing and growth strategies to deliver results that truly impact our clients' revenue. Technology should serve the business, not the other way around.

contact.q1: How long does a typical project take?
contact.a1: 2-8 weeks depending on complexity. Simple stores take 2-3 weeks, while headless builds may take 6-8 weeks.
contact.q2: Do you work with clients worldwide?
contact.a2: Yes! I work with clients in 15+ countries including Brazil, USA, Canada, UK, and Australia.
